posts.topic: LGBTQ+ and Transgender Rights: Rights in education, healthcare, and public spaces
posts.name: EcoInclusive
posts.text: I think it is important to explore how we can better support LGBTQ plus and transgender rights in education healthcare and public spaces but I am still learning about all the complexities involved. What do you think are some key steps we can take while being mindful of different perspectives?
